posts.content:
BUS NOW SOLD MORE BUSSES COME SOON PLEASE JUST VISIT OUR FACEBOOK https://www.facebook.com/A-W-Classic-Ve ... 173121712/
An excellent example of a 1968 VW Kombi 15 window split-screen bus LHD imported from Brazil. Colour is in two tone white and green. Nice solid bus only requiring some age related TLC , also rust and rot free. Engine starts first time, as a new engine was fitted in 2010. Bus has had full service, all oils changed, brakes have been inspected and serviced, all electrics have been tested and are in full working order.
Interior is standard 9 seat layout. Bus has new door cards and interior linings in cab. New mirrors are fitted and all tyres are good.
Ready to use has a minibus or blank canvas for campervan conversion. Taxes have been paid and NOVA and Brazilian log book will be available to enable new owner to register in the UK, if assistance is needed with this ,it will be available to the new owner, also bus has M.O.T until Jan 2017.

PRICE £11950

SOLD AS SEEN


Cash on collection or bank transfer

The bus is available to view and test drive in ****** N. Lincolnshire DN15
We can arrange delivery any where in the UK at cost to buyer.
For extra pictures please refer to my Facebook link https://www.facebook.com/A-W-Classic-Ve ... 12/?ref=hl
For further enquiries please contact Anderson on 07500 050884 or 01724 781729
Gordon on 07507 651436 or email ander.borinelli@hotmail.com
